thread.title: Fred Williams

author: Fred Williams
title: Fred Williams
text: I don't trust them, I sent a book back in decent condition and once received they complained saying it didn't meet their standards and I would have to send them $4 to get it returned back to me OR I could just let them recycle it.... this is scam and I'm sure they are hoping most people will just let them keep it and they probably resell it.... totally illegal. In my case, I sent via Paypal the $4 return shipping and won't give them the satisfaction... Avoid like the plague!
